
# Question 1

```{r}
business_data <- read.csv("D:\\business_performance.csv")
```

```{r}
str(business_data)
```

```{r}
summary(business_data)
```


```{r}
Total_Revenue_by_Channel <- aggregate(revenue ~ channel,
                                      data = business_data,
                                      sum,
                                      na.rm = TRUE)
Total_Revenue_by_Channel
```

```{r}
Average_Customers_by_Quarter <- aggregate(customers ~ quarter,
                                          data = business_data,
                                          mean,
                                          na.rm = TRUE)
Average_Customers_by_Quarter
```


```{r}
business_data$revenue_per_customer <- business_data$revenue / business_data$customers

Average_Revenue_by_Channel <- aggregate(revenue_per_customer ~ customers,
                                        data = business_data,
                                        mean,
                                        na.rm = TRUE)
Average_Revenue_by_Channel
```

# Question 2

```{r}
channel_totals <- aggregate(revenue ~ channel, data = business_data, sum)

ggplot(channel_totals, aes(x = channel, y = revenue,)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "Total Revenue by Channel",
       x = "Sales Channel", y = "Revenue ($)")
```

```{r}
ggplot(business_data, aes(x = customers, y = revenue, colour = channel)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  labs(title = "Customer Count vs Revenue by Channel",
       x = "Number of Customers", y = "Revenue ($)")
```
